column2: Job Description:  We are seeking a Social Media Manager to join our team and oversee our social media presence. The ideal candidate will possess a comprehensive understanding of social media platforms, web3, and the cryptocurrency industry. They should be hardworking, self-motivated, and eager to take on challenges, with a strong passion for technology, particularly blockchain and cryptocurrency. Responsibilities: Develop and execute a social media strategy that aligns with our business goals and services, as outlined on our website. Conduct research and create engaging social media content, including memes and graphics, that resonates with our target audience in the blockchain and cryptocurrency space. Manage all social media platforms, including but not limited to, Telegram, Instagram, and Twitter. Monitor and respond to social media comments and messages in a timely manner. Collaborate with the marketing team to ensure brand consistency across all platforms. Analyze social media metrics and provide regular reports on performance. Stay up-to-date with the latest trends and memes in blockchain technology and cryptocurrency, and integrate them into our social media strategy. Create banners, posters, ad creatives, and other graphics as needed. Requirements: Experience as a Social Media Manager or similar role. Strong knowledge of social media platforms and analytics tools. Proficiency in using Canva and copywriting Knowledge of Facebook and Twitter Ads Great communication and writing skills. Passionate about Web3 and blockchain technology and news Strong organizational and time-management skills Should be creative, hardworking, and bring new ideas to the table   Perks and Benefits: Chance to work in one of the fastest-growing industries of Blockchain. Learn and grow faster with good talented people Work from home and flexible timing Also, get additional services like a Netflix subscription, an Udemy course, and a free Zomato food coupon every month. Education Qualification: This role is open to everyone. We value the skills and abilities of each person. Job Location: We're looking for someone who is willing to work remotely and has flexible timing. You can work according to your preferences, but we expect dedication from your side. Salary Range:   INR 2-4 LPA Position:  Full time Experience:  1-5 years Joining date:  Immediate Note: The Matrix Labs reserves the right to make changes in the program and the policies from time to time.
